Now that the good folks of this list have assisted me in obtaining the
stan=
dard out of the java object that I was testing, I have one further
question=
.

What is the prevailing best practice for testing the output when it has
=
different end-of-line markers from different operating systems? My
lovely n=
ew tests are failing on Microsoft Windows!

I use Linux primarily but also =
have to deliver software and their unit
tests to people using Microsoft Win=
dows and let's not forget Mac OSX.

Thank you in advance.

Simon
